scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Annunciation within an arched frame. On the left, the Angel Gabriel, dressed in a red robe, kneels and gestures towards the Virgin Mary. A scroll with Latin text, "Ecce ancilla Domini" (Behold the handmaid of the Lord), unfurls from his mouth. The Virgin Mary, on the right, is seated and dressed in a blue robe. She is shown reading from a book placed on a table covered with a pink cloth. Behind her, a green curtain hangs, suggesting an interior setting. The floor is depicted as a green grid pattern. The background is a rich gold, indicating a divine or elevated space. The overall scene is framed by decorative borders with floral motifs.
